Module com.mihaibojin.props.core
Package com.mihaibojin.props.core

Interface Prop<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the property's type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Converter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBooleanProp, AbstractChronoUnitProp, AbstractDateProp, AbstractDoubleProp, AbstractDurationProp, AbstractFloatProp, AbstractInstantProp, AbstractIntegerProp, AbstractListOfDoubleProp, AbstractListOfFloatProp, AbstractListOfIntegerProp, AbstractListOfLongProp, AbstractListOfStringProp, AbstractLongProp, AbstractNumericDurationProp, AbstractPathProp, AbstractProp, AbstractStringProp
    public interface Prop<T>
extends Converter<T>
    Interface with common property methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String description()
      Returns a short description explaining what this prop is used for.
      boolean isRequired()
      Returns true if this Prop requires a value.
      boolean isSecret()
      Returns true if this Prop represents a secret and its value should be redacted when printed.
      java.lang.String key()
      Identifies the Prop.
      java.util.Optional<T> value()
      Returns the property's current value.

        Identifies the Prop.

      • value

        java.util.Optional<T> value()
        Returns the property's current value.
        Returns:
        the Prop's current value, or an empty Optional if one could not be determined.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the value could not be validated

      • description

        @Nullable
java.lang.String description()
        Returns a short description explaining what this prop is used for.
        Returns:
        a short, developer-friendly description

      • isRequired

        boolean isRequired()
        Returns true if this Prop requires a value.
        Returns:
        true if the property should have a value or a default

      • isSecret

        boolean isSecret()
        Returns true if this Prop represents a secret and its value should be redacted when printed.
        Returns:
        true if the property is a 'secret'
